name: Grinningferret.GitHub.io
body:
**I'm a Custom ROM and Custom kernel developer from Germany.**

Actually I have two running projects:

[Lollipop CarbonROM](http://forum.xda-developers.com/lg-l90/development/rom-carbonrom-t3121544)

[Resurrection Remix](http://forum.xda-developers.com/lg-l90/development/rom-resurrection-remix-t3097036)



If you wish to contact me send me a PM at [xda-developers](http://forum.xda-developers.com/member.php?u=6143324).


BTW, watching youXD

![](http://www.danasoft.com/sig/204491206985.jpg)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
